adHeader: Need a painter? Look no further!
adDetails: Hello my name is Christopher and I have been a professional painter for 10yrs now. I have worked with a lot of General contractors such as Shappel industries northern california, kb homes, vkw renovations( Texas) greenhouse builders( Texas) and many more. I have also done work as my own company during this time. I have all the experience necessary to complete any size job you throw my way. I have all my own tools and a go to attitude that will make your project less stressful. So if a free estimate/consultation is what you are looking for then please feel free to give me a call.
